content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2022/09/arcanoweave-part-6 html if you have already purchased the pdf this update is available for free in your pattern library this is part 6 of the arcanoweave doily the pattern continues where part 5 left off starting on round 83 and ending with round 96 the finished size measures about 32 in diameter this pattern is available in english and is written using u s terminology here are links to the previous sections- part 1 arcane aura 1 part 2 incanter s insight 2 part 3 evocation 3 part 4 innervision 4 part 5 terrace of the magi 5 materials needed- size 10 crochet thread- for part 6- 450-500yards for the entire doily- 1800-2000 yards 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors special stitches used in this section- 2-fpdc decrease 3-double_crochet popcorn fppuff st special 2-double_crochet cluster picot small picot large picot 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi
